short.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4: A light, dark theme for YouTube with easy toggle on and off and scheduling support. This theme is based on the default YouTube theme
short.bg: Светла и тъмна тема за YouTube с лесно превключване на включването и изключването и поддръжка на планиране
short.cs: Světlé a tmavé téma pro YouTube se snadným zapínáním a vypínáním a podporou plánování.
short.da: Et lyst, mørkt tema til YouTube med let til- og frakobling og støtte til planlægning
short.de: Ein helles, dunkles Theme für YouTube mit einfachem Ein- und Ausschalten und Unterstützung für die Zeitplanung
short.el: Ένα ανοιχτόχρωμο, σκούρο θέμα για το YouTube με εύκολη εναλλαγή ενεργοποίησης και απενεργοποίησης και υποστήριξη προγραμματισμού.
short.et: Hele, tume teema YouTube'ile, mis on hõlpsasti sisse- ja väljalülitatav ning toetab ajakava koostamist.
short.fi: Vaalea ja tumma teema YouTubea varten, jossa on helppo vaihtaa päälle ja pois päältä sekä aikataulutuki.
short.fr: Un thème clair et foncé pour YouTube, avec une activation et une désactivation faciles et la prise en charge de la programmation.
short.hu: Világos, sötét téma a YouTube-hoz, egyszerű ki- és bekapcsolással és ütemezés támogatással.
short.it: Un tema chiaro e scuro per YouTube con facile accensione e spegnimento e supporto alla programmazione
short.ja: 簡単にオンとオフを切り替えられ、スケジューリングにも対応したYouTube用のライト＆ダークテーマです。このテーマは、デフォルトのYouTubeテーマに基づいています
short.nl: Een licht, donker thema voor YouTube met eenvoudige aan- en uitschakeling en ondersteuning voor planning
short.zh_CN: 为YouTube设计的浅色、深色主题，易于切换开和关，支持调度。这个主题是基于默认的YouTube主题

long.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4:
"Dark Theme for YouTube" extension converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme. This extension is built on top of the default YouTube theme (native dark theme) so it is very light-weighted compare to using themes injected by Stylish or Stylus extensions.

Features:
Turn on and off from the action button to switch between light and dark themes
Accepts scheduling to turn on only on the specified period
Customize default color scheme
Inject custom CSS to alter the default theme (change font-size or font-family for instance)

How does this extension work?
This extension alters a cookie globally to turn the dark theme on and off. It also injects a lite script to the YouTube pages to alter the color scheme of the root element. In oppose to the other similar extensions, there is no resetting of the default theme or inverting the white theme with an inversion filter. Both of these methods are computationally inefficient. Instead, this extension asks YouTube to turn the native dark theme and only alter the global CSS variables to alter the colors.
Note that this method only works if the product supports native coloring. Some Google products do not yet support this feature.

Privacy Policy: 
This extension does not send or receive any data to any server whatsoever.

Bug Report:
Please either use the commenting section of the FAQs page or the GitHub page for bug reporting.

Change Log:
0.2.0
Use the built-in dark theme (Material Design only)
long.bg,cs,da,de,el,et,fi,fr,hu,it,ja,nl,zh_C:
Dark Theme for YouTube™ add-on converts YouTube theme to a highly customizable dark charcoal/blue theme.

note that as of version 0.2.0, the extension forces the built-in dark theme. This version does not allow customization. I have a plan to bring the customization back to the extension soon.


If you have ideas to improve this theme please open a bug report here:
http://add0n.com/dark-theme.html?from=youtube


Notes:
1. You can apply your own CSS rules to the default theme
2. This theme enhances the native dark theme so it will be compatible with YouTube theme changes
3. You can set a time schedule to enable or disable the dark theme

Change Log
0.2.0
Use the built-in dark theme (Material Design only)
